+-------------------------------------------------------+
| Paragraph (greedy)                                    |
+=======================================================+
| All text up to image is included:                     |        
| ```                                                   |
| console.log("hello")                                  |
| ```                                                   |
| <a href="www.google.com">Google</a>                   |
|                                                       |
| ![Image][image0]                                      |
|                                                       |
| After image there's more text                         |
+-------------------------------------------------------+

[image0]: http://localhost/1.jpg
